page.title: 05ST MARY'S TRANSPORTATION
page.content: { GENERAL TRANSPORT} Another method of transport is the steamships ship{Scillonian}.It weighs 1200 tonnes and comes every weekday with cargo and supplies.There is a bus service around St Marys,and there are also{taxis.}If you come by Scillonian to the islands your cases will be delivered by{Island Carriers}which are haulage contractors.The carriers have been operating for years and used to be called Guy and Hallet.There is island tours on very old buses.This is owned by Vic Trenwith who is 82 and pays two younger people to do the job.There is two bicycle hire places Buccubu and Guys.Buccabu is owned by Sid Lewis and has a lot bicycles.Guys is owned by Derek Guy and also has a lot of{bicycles}.Solomons carry fuel and coal.They have two tankers a 5 ton lorry and a van.S.W.E.B has a tanker.
